Posts.Content: May 18, 2012 02:53PM stickyspaniel wrote: Hi both, thanks for your replies. I know there is nothing I can do until I have had the scan but 7 days seems an eternity - then my appointment with the consultant isn't for another month. I wasn't too worried to start with but I am thinking about it all the time now. I am pleased your scan came back clear Wilson - and I do hope the itchiness stops soon - it can drive you mad - especially when you are in public and would love to scratch or rub at it!!!
